salaryExpectations: LKR 70,000 (Junior Nutritionist) to LKR 300,000+ (Senior Consultant/Private Practice) per month.
futureOutlook: As awareness of lifestyle-related diseases (like diabetes and heart disease) increases, the demand for professional nutritional advice is growing. The wellness and fitness industries are major drivers of growth. Successful nutritionists often build a strong personal brand and run their own private consultancy services.
